violations.description: Variable 'result' assigned from zod.safeParse() has unprotected error check. Error handling must be in try-catch block.
violations.suggested_fix:
Caller MUST check result.success before accessing result.data or result.error.
TypeScript discriminated unions enforce this at compile time.

violations.description: Variable 'validData' assigned from zod.parse() has no error check. Return value must be checked for errors.
violations.suggested_fix:
Caller MUST wrap parse() in try-catch block or use safeParse() instead.
ZodError contains detailed validation failure information in the 'issues' array.

violations.description: Variable 'validData' assigned from zod.parse() has no error check. Return value must be checked for errors.
violations.suggested_fix:
Caller MUST wrap parse() in try-catch block or use safeParse() instead.
ZodError contains detailed validation failure information in the 'issues' array.

Caller MUST wrap parseAsync() in try-catch block or use safeParseAsync() instead.

lines.content: // ❌ No error handling - will throw ZodError on invalid input or failed refinement
// ❌ Violation 3: Type coercion with parse() without try-catch

violations.description: No try-catch block found. ZodError - this will crash the application.
violations.suggested_fix:
Caller MUST handle async refinement failures. The error.issues array will
contain details about which refinements failed.
